\section{Problem A: Comparing $AR(2)$ parameter estimators using resampling of residuals}

\subsection{1.}

```{r}
#######################################
# Find estimators for beta and epsilon
#######################################
p <- 2
x <- data3A$x

betas <- ARp.beta.est(x, p)

beta_ls <- betas$LS
beta_la <- betas$LA

epsilon_ls <- ARp.resid(x, beta_ls)
epsilon_la <- ARp.resid(x, beta_la)
```

```{r}

# 
boot_iter <- 1500

beta_mat_ls <- bootstrapA(x = x,
                       beta = beta_ls,
                       epsilon = epsilon_ls,
                       boot_iter = boot_iter,
                       type = "LS")


displayBeta(samples = beta_mat_ls,
            title = "Least squares")


beta_mat_la <- bootstrapA(x = x,
                       beta = beta_la,
                       epsilon = epsilon_la,
                       boot_iter = boot_iter,
                       type = "LA")


displayBeta(samples = beta_mat_ls,
            title = "Least absolutes")


```
